entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
